title: Possible scam?
content:
Recently I received an email from " Firefox Monitor<breach@mozilla.com> " advising that my email was found in a new data breach. Is this legitimate or from a scam site? What should I do ?

Thanks for your assistance. Lloyd Ellis
creator: lloydellis15

title: Export historie prohlížení
content: Jak vyexportovat historii za určité časové období? Třeba za měsíc. Lze provést export do formátu Excel? Děkuji Jarda
creator: jrychnovsky

title: Captcha won't take
content: I'm still using Windows 7. When I try to set up a GoogleGroup using Firefox and check "I am not a robot" it just spins and after 15 seconds or so just goes nowhere. But when I use Chrome, I have no problem being approved by Captcha. How can I fix it so that I can do the same via FireFox?
creator: MitchelCohen

title: Přihlášení do Komerční banky
content: Dobrý den, nedaří se mi přihlásit do interbnetového bankovnictví pomocí Firefoxu u Komerční banky. Po zadání přihlašovacích údajů a potvrzení přes klíč, se mi objeví bílá záložka. Nepomohl ani reset Firefoxu do zakladního nastavení. U Chromu to jede normálně. Co stím?
creator: oplustil.m

title: Come disattivare i processi multipli di firefox
content:
Buongiorno, quando apro firefox si aprono 6 processi (task manager). Seguendo le indicazioni del forum ho provato a disattivare nelle prestazioni "Utilizza le impostazioni predefinite" ma non compare l'opzione per poter disattivare i processi multipli. Il mio PC utilizza windows 7 ultimate service pack 1 a 32 bit e la versione di firefox è 108.0.1 Ho provato anche a inserire una nuova variabile d'ambiente utente MOZ_FORCE_DISABLE_E10S con valore della variabile uguale a 1, ma senza risultato. Per certezza ho riavviato il PC ma sempre uguale. Vi sarei grato se riusciste a darmi una mano. Grazie in anticipo. 

            Stefano
creator: stefanomarche58

title: signon.autofillForms.http not working
content:
Hello,

I have set signon.autofillForms.http to true but browser still not auto fill saved login to form. I need click to manually then select saved login. How can i fix it? this will save me time and manipulation. Thank you

Regards,
creator: kisitora

title: Firefox no guarda los datos de los formularios
content: Quiero que Firefox guarde las entradas de los formularios, pero no memorizando un formulario que ya he rellenado, sino en los formularios nuevos. He visto que en otros navegadores se pueden guardar tus datos para que, cada vez que entras en un nuevo formulario, te cargue tus datos automáticamente (nombre y apellidos, email, dirección). Hice una consulta similar y se me dijo que tenía que personalizar la opción "Usar una configuración personalizada para el historial" marcando "Recordar el historial de datos". Pero no funciona. Tengo ya la configuración de esta manera y mis datos ni están guardados ni se cargan. ¿Alguna solución?
creator: carteia

title: firefox me site open nahi ho pa rshi hai
content: shiksha portal or education portal open nahi ho raha hain mozilla firefox me please help
creator: ssongara364

title: Browser gets stuck and, can't open sites in new tabs, can't save pages from the current tabs.
content:
Sometimes, unpredictably, the browser stops working in a way that the page stops working, and trying to reload the page, open a new tab, or even save the content on a page, simply doesn't work. The singlefile extension fails, and I can't just disable it, and re-enable it, the browser won't let me do that, either. The browser's built-in save function won't even progress to completion. That is inconvenient when I'm trying to save chat, or some other ephemeral thing, that won't be available after restarting the browser. I don't want this to happen anymore. I don't want this situation to recur. I'm not sure what to do to prevent it in the future. I'm not sure what causes this mess. I don't know what else to say about it. Please tell me what I'm doing wrong, and how to fix this?

The browser seemed to be in the throes a crash, but it just wouldn't finish itself off. So I killed the main process, which I thought should trigger a crash report, but it didn't.
creator: PAGulley

title: Second time when Firefox was closed, when restarted lost all tabs!
content:
This is the second time fairly recently after Firefox was closed, and restarted I lost all tabs, perhaps 8! This is even with the Startup option, Open previous windows and tabs selected. I had some important websites on tabs and I lost them and using the history option, I was only to open one website and not the most important.

This is VERY poor operation and enough to cause me to want to migrate to a different browser.

This needs to be fixed without delay.
creator: WCarp7

title: deactivate my account
content:

title: Twitch Not Supported
content: I signed out of my Twitch account to log into another account and I am getting a message that says Your browser is not currently supported. Please use a recommended browser or learn more here. I am able to sign in on Chrome and the Private tab for Firefox. Unfortunately, it signs me out on the private tab so I would like to be able to sign into my account again on my not private web browser hahah. I have refreshed Firefox, I have Ctr-F5, I have tried other troubleshooting things and nothing seems to work. I did see someone say to de-upgrade, but I am not 100% how to do that.
creator: lilmonnster

title: Firefox closes immediately after opening it
content:
Hello!

I recently got a new PC, and every time I open up Firefox it instantly closes. I have tried downloading it on the Microsoft Store, it seems to work fine for 5 minutes and then it happens again.
creator: chillestyt

title: Can't download video in Facebook container tabs
content: Hello, I am not incredibly tech-savvy, so please bear with me. When I am in a Facebook container tab and I click a link to a video, a new tab opens and suddenly all the tabs I have open in Facebook start flashing. All I can do is close Firefox. If I open it again, the page is blank and the tabs have stopped flickering. Is there a solution to this problem? I have about a dozen tabs open, roughly half are in Facebook containers. Please help! Thanks.
creator: 75pintail

title: Bookmarks Toolbar clickable area reduced to bottom edge only
content: I think this started after my most recent upgrade - I'm currently on 108.0.1, but I suspect it was an upgrade from 107, not just from 108.0 (I use PortableApps and only upgrade through PA, and it takes time for PA to prep new versions of app, so sometimes short-lived versions are skipped, and the 108.0.1 changelog only mentions one tiny bug fix). When trying to access a bookmark or folder on my bookmarks toolbar, nothing happens (color change or tooltip on hover, nor clicking) unless the mouse is at the very bottom edge of the button area, well below where the icon and text are. Is this happening to anyone else? I use the bookmarks toolbar heavily, so this is very annoying.
creator: osakawebbie
